meanings.definition: A person who participates in or supports jihad.
meanings.sent1: The jihadis trained hard for their mission.
meanings.sent2: The village was threatened by a group of jihadis.
meanings.sent3: The jihadis tried to sneak up on the enemy but ended up scaring a flock of birds instead.
meanings.sent4: The presence of the jihadis in the region was like a dark cloud looming over the peaceful town.
meanings.sent5: The news of the jihadis' arrival spread fear throughout the countryside.

meanings.sent1: Many jihadis gathered to discuss their next move.
meanings.sent2: The captured weapons belonged to the group of jihadis.
meanings.sent3: The jihadis accidentally wore mismatched socks to their important meeting.
meanings.sent4: The streets were empty, except for the shadows of the jihadis moving stealthily.
meanings.sent5: The leader of the jihadis stood tall, commanding respect from his followers.
